No: 241/KH-LT, dated May 31, 2001 of The Department General of Posts and Telecommunications,Vietnam National Union of Posts and Telecoms Workers, and The Vietnam Posts and Telecommunications Corporation Activities to commemorate the 55 th founding anniversary of the Vietnam National Union of Post and Telecoms Workers (VNUPTW) (1947 - 2002). In implementing Directive No 04/CT-BCS dated May 08, 2001 of the Party Secretariat of DGPT on "celebration activities of the 55th anniversary of VNUPTW" (August 30, 1947 - August 30, 2002), leaders of the Department General of Posts and Telecommunications (DGPT), the Vietnam Posts and Telecommunications Corporation (VNPT), and the Standing Committee of VNUPTW have agreed to carry out the following activities: * Giving more intensive education on the tradition of the sector and of the country in order to increase awareness and responsibility of all staff, creating radical changes in their mind and action so that they can fulfil any assignment and plan; Enhancing and improving campaigns, emulation movements and revolutionary acts for the successful implementation of the Resolution of the 9th Party Congress. * Attaching internal activities to local and social ones in order to give people better understanding of the sector, to gain more prestige as well as to make good use of outside support to create favourable conditions for the sector to accelerate. * All celebration activities must reflect the sector's general plan and VNUPTW's celebration; mainly organized at member units. * Being practical and effective, trying to avoid formalism 1. Professional leaders and Trade Unions of all levels in co-ordination with the Party committee are to organize new propaganda and political activities for staff from the beginning of 20002 . The content focuses on such important topics as follows: * Enforcing propaganda activities related to the country, the sector, the role-models and the good people and good works within the sector. * Providing staff with further education on Vietnamese tradition country and people, the 57 year history of the P&T sector and 55 year of developing staff and VNUPTW. Issuing a special postage stamp set in commemoration of the 55th anniversary of VNUPTW. By education and propaganda, ensuring staff's concertedness and full awareness of the sector's major plans such as: * The split of Post from Telecoms. * Preparation for competition and integration. * Improvement of productivity and quality in business, utilities service and management works. 2. Organizing ebullient revolutionary movements in the entire sector, focusing on tasks and goals set for 2002 and the 2001 - 2005 five years plan such as: * Continuously strengthening the implementation of the 5 campaigns, reviewing the last 5 years of implementation of the 5 campaigns and proposing suitable solutions for the new process. * Applying measures to renovate management and P&T business in cities and provinces. * Encouraging staff to outline and realize in to effect implementation programs of the 9 th Party Congress's Resolution as well as the sector's detailed integration program. 3. Building a qualified P&T staff contingent, satisfying integration and development requirements, focusing on: * Pushing up the movement of "Good teaching, good learning, building a healthy training environment against negative problems" * Organising P&T civilization contests among the entire staff. * Reviewing the three year implementation of Resolution "P&T female staff heading to the 21 st century". Applying measures to improve capability of the unit in charge of "For the development of P&T Women". 4. Taking care of material and spiritual lives of all staff. * Effectively implementing salary and income distribution. renovation. * Reviewing the 12 year history of the sector's social funds (1990 â€“ 2002). * Organizing cultural and sports events for its member units. * Carrying out humanity activities such as: visiting, caring, supporting and giving presents for the sector's privileged beneficiaries . 5. Enhancing strong development of Trade Union. * Issuing VNUPTW's regulations on Trade Union's activities in integration and development process. * Reviewing the 5 years of Trade Unions working in groups; designing new activities plans for the new process. 1. Professional leaders and the standing committee of provincial and municipal's P&T Trade Unions and member units should design their own implementation programmes on Directive No. 04/BCS dated May 8, 2001, this joint plan and VNUPTW's celebration proposal. 2. VNUPTW and its members should establish organizing boards at their level, inviting the sector's leaders and specialised leaders to take part in the organizing board and to co-operate in guiding the celebratory activities. 3. Carrying out the plan to celebrate at member units, creating an enthusiasm among staff and trying to surpass the 2002 plan. 4. Organizing the 55 th anniversary of VNUPTW meeting at member units offices and in group by the end of August, 2002. 1. Chiefs of Offices, Departments and Divisions, an Directors of Information Centers under DGPT, VNPT, and VNUPTW in their function must be working with leaders of DGPT, VNPT, and the standing committee of VNUPTW to implement successfully. 2. Specialized leaders and Chairmen of Trade Unions of member units are responsible for ozganizing the plan most successfully. Their implementation plans must be sent to the sector and VNUPTW's leaders in October, 2001.

Vietnam National Union of Post and Telecoms Workers Being the professional trade union economic and financial manager within the P&T sector in line with Party and State regulations and VNUPTW charter Studying to propose solutions related to VNUPTW's economics and finance in accordance with Party directions and lines, State policies, laws and regimes, directions and resolutions of the Vietnam General Confederation of Labor, as well as of Standing Committee of VNUPTW Being the counsellor to the Standing Committee of VNUPTW in instructing the implementation of financial work within the P&T sector Proposing and actively taking part in and carrying out the sector's financial work in co-operation with the Vietnam General Confederation of Labor 1. Mapping out and submitting the annual directions, objectives, and plans and programs to the Standing Committee of VNUPTW for approval 2. Carrying out feminine affairs within the sector: a. Outlining the financial decentralization regime, and the deduction method applicable to P&T units in line with relevant regulations, timely and consistently in the entire sector b. Generalizing and making the financial balance sheet of VNUPTW to submit to the Vietnam General Confederation of Labor meeting content and time standards c. Creating sources, managing and allocating funding to serve activities of all VNUPTW activities at all levels d. Providing accounting guidelines for VNUPTW members to properly abide by trade union financial collection and spending provided by the Vietnam General Confederation of Labor e. Being the manager of sources of funds raised by P&T staff; co-operating with other relevant bodies to evaluate and submit the quarterly and yearly cost estimate and balance sheet of units that are assigned by the Standing Committee of VNUPTW to directly manage and use these sources 3. Speeding up, examining, generalizing and summing up the economic and financial situation according to the approved plans 4. Organizing professional training courses in trade union economics and finance according to the approved plans 5. Reporting accurate, adequate and update information for the Standing Committee of VNUPTW to work with the Vietnam General Confederation of Labor in the field of trade union finance 6. Helping the leaders of VNUPTW in managing sources of funds, carrying out financial collection and spending serving activities of VNUPTW activities 3. Range of competence Authorized by the Standing Committee of VNUPTW to sign professional guiding documents on trade union finance Authorized by the Standing Committee of VNUPTW to examine and supervise trade union economic and financial activities at all levels within VNUPTW Allowed to make spending decisions as decentralized to serve VNUPTW activities The chief of the department has the range of competence and duties of the chief accountant of VNUPTW in accordance with guidance and regulations of the Vietnam General Confederation of Labor and the Ordinance n Accounting and Statistics of the State The department is under the direct and comprehensive direction of the Standing Committee of VNUPTW and abides by regulations of the leaders of VNUPTW Establishing professional guiding relations with functional departments of the Vietnam General Confederation of Labor Establishing equal relations with functional departments and divisions of DGPT, VNPT and local labor unions related to trade union financial activities Establishing co-operative relations with departments, offices, groups and centers under VNUPTW Establishing relations with accountants of trade unions as well as the standing committees at all levels according to the assigned functions and duties The department is managed by a chief who is aided by members. The chief is responsible to the Standing Committee of VNUPTW for the performance results of the department.
